name: MAGIX Video Project
summary: Learn about .MVP files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Movie Studio and Video Pro X are video editors for casual and professional users in Windows. When you first save a project in Movie Studio or Video Pro X, the program creates an MVP file to store the contents of the project. You can also save backups of projects as MVP files by selecting File → Backup copy.
NOTE: Movie Studio was formerly known as Movie Edit Pro.

instructions: You can open an MVP file with MAGIX Movie Studio and Video Pro X in Windows. To open an MVP file, select File → Open.
